query.prompt: Show contractions of preposition and article in Italian. No examples are needed.
query.result:
**Italian preposition + definite article contractions**
| Preposition | + il → | + lo → | + la → | + l’ → | + i → | + gli → | + le → | |------------|--------|--------|--------|--------|-------|----------|--------| | **di** | del | dello | della | dell’ | dei | degli | delle | | **a** | al | allo | alla | all’ | ai | agli | alle | | **da** | dal | dallo | dalla | dall’ | dai | dagli | dalle | | **in** | nel | nello | nella | nell’ | nei | negli | nelle | | **su** | sul | sullo | sulla | sull’ | sui | sugli | sulle | | **con** | col* | col* | colla* | colla* | col* | col* | colla* |
\* *“col”* is the contracted form of **con + il** (and, by extension, of **con + lo**, **con + l’**, **con + i**, **con + gli**). The other combinations with **con** (e.g., *con la, con le*) do not contract.
These are the only standard preposition + article contractions in contemporary Italian. No other preposition (e.g., *per, tra, fra*) forms a contracted form with the definite article.

query.prompt:
This text is written in Italian. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns. * Provide only the word table without any additional explanations or commentary outside the table.
1 Nel mezzo del cammin di nostra vita 9 dirò de l’altre cose ch’i’ v’ho scorte. 28 Poi ch’èi posato un poco il corpo lasso, 67 Rispuosemi: «Non omo, omo già fui,
query.result: | Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Gender | Number | Person | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | Nel | in+il | preposition+article | m. | sg. | | | | contraction | | mezzo | mezzo | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | del | di+il | preposition+article | m. | sg. | | | | contraction | | cammin | cammino | noun | m. | sg. | | | | apocope | | di | di | preposition | | | | | | | | nostra | nostro | adjective | f. | sg. | | | | possessive | | vita | vita | noun | f. | sg. | | | | | | dirò | dire | verb | | sg. | 1 | future | indicative | | | de | di | preposition | | | | | | archaic | | l’ | il | article | f. | pl. | | | | elision | | altre | altro | adjective | f. | pl. | | | | | | cose | cosa | noun | f. | pl. | | | | | | ch’ | che | pronoun | | | | | | relative, elision | | i’ | io | pronoun | | sg. | 1 | | | elision | | v’ | vi | adverb | | | | | | elision | | ho | avere | verb | | sg. | 1 | present | indicative | auxiliary | | scorte | scorgere | verb | f. | pl. | | past | participle | | | Poi | poi | adverb | | | | | | | | ch’ | che | conjunction | | | | | | elision | | èi | egli | pronoun | m. | sg. | 3 | | | archaic | | posato | posare | verb | m. | sg. | | past | participle | | | un | uno | article | m. | sg. | | | | indefinite | | poco | poco | adverb | | | | | | | | il | il | article | m. | sg. | | | | | | corpo | corpo | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | lasso | lasso | adjective | m. | sg. | | | | | | Rispuosemi | rispondere+mi | verb+pronoun | | sg. | 3 | remote past | indicative | enclitic pronoun | | Non | non | adverb | | | | | | | | omo | uomo | noun | m. | sg. | | | | archaic | | omo | uomo | noun | m. | sg. | | | | archaic | | già | già | adverb | | | | | | | | fui | essere | verb | | sg. | 1 | remote past | indicative | |
